WriteBot API Documentation

Welcome to the WriteBot API documentation. WriteBot is a handwriting synthesis application that generates realistic handwritten text using neural networks.

Overview

WriteBot provides a comprehensive REST API for generating handwritten text in SVG format. The API supports:

  • Single text generation

  • Batch generation with CSV import

  • Multiple handwriting styles

  • Character overrides for custom variants

  • User authentication and authorization

  • Admin dashboard for user management

Quick Start

  1. Authentication: Log in to get access to the API

  2. Generate: Use the generation endpoints to create handwritten text

  3. Batch Processing: Upload CSV files for bulk generation

  4. Styles: Choose from multiple handwriting styles
